total_revenue.context: Q1 2025 revenue of $42.3B driven by ads strength, business messaging, and ongoing user growth.

costs_and_expenses.context: Operating costs rose with infrastructure inflation, but lower legal expenses kept growth controlled.

operating_income.context: Operating margin expanded from 38% to 41% as AI-driven ads performance offset infrastructure costs.

net_income.context: Net income benefited from higher leverage and a lower tax rate (9%) due to share-based comp windfalls.

free_cash_flow.context: Free cash flow after $12.9B of CapEx and $751M finance lease payments.

capital_expenditures.context: CapEx up as data center build-outs and AI hardware costs accelerate; FY guide now $64-72B.

other_revenue.context: Business messaging and WhatsApp revenue growth (+34%).

revenue.context: Hardware sales down as Quest softens but Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses continue to ramp.

expenses.context: Higher staffing and go-to-market investments kept RL losses around $4.2B.

initiatives: Generative Ads Recommendation Model (GEM) training on thousands of GPUs
Advantage+ Creative expansion with video expansion and image generation
Incremental attribution tests showing +46% lift in conversions
goals: Drive precision ad supply matching to objectives
Rationalize ad formats across emerging formats (Reels, Threads)

milestones: Meta AI continues scaling to ~1B MAUs across surfaces
Stand-alone Meta AI app launched with social feed and personalization
Live translations rolled out on Ray-Ban Meta AI glasses
goals: Deepen personalization via memory and activity data
Use Meta AI to power new business messaging agents
Advance AI devices that blend physical and digital contexts

infrastructure.description: CapEx range raised to $64-72B to keep AI and core capacity ahead of demand while staying flexible.
drivers: Higher hardware costs from global supply uncertainty
Flexible deployment across gen AI and rankings

q2_2025_revenue_guidance.context: Assumes ~1% FX tailwind and reflects e-commerce advertiser uncertainty post-de minimis Elimination.

full_year_2025_expenses.context: Updated view incorporates refined personnel forecasts offsetting higher infrastructure/Reality Labs COGS.

capex.context: Revised up to fund faster data center deployment and absorb rising hardware costs.

tax_rate.context: No change despite lower Q1 tax screw.

regulatory.focus: Monitoring DMA compliance on no-ads subscription model and potential EU revenue impact.
